instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Playfair Display' for all Headings (h1-h3) to give an editorial look.
Use 'Manrope' for all body text and UI elements.
Implement a 'Sharp' aesthetic: 0px border-radius on buttons, inputs, and cards.
Use generous whitespace. Padding should be 2x normal (e.g., py-24 instead of py-12).
Product cards should be minimal: Image + Title + Price. No 'Add to Cart' button visible until hover (or keep it clean and just link to detail).
Navigation: Sticky, minimal. Logo centered or left. Links: Shop, Collections, About. Right: Search, Account, Cart (Text 'Cart (0)').
Footer: Large, 4-column. Big typography for the newsletter signup.
Use the provided image URLs for the respective sections.
Ensure high contrast for text (Dark Grey on Off-White).
Do not use gradients. Use solid colors or subtle textures.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) sparingly, only for sticky nav.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles (Sharp Rectangles for this brand).
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
